headline: Cybersecurity Tops CFO’s Risk Agenda With 99% Reporting Incidents and 94% Planning to Increase Spend
summary: LONDON, October 08, 2025--Corpay finds that 99% of UK finance leaders surveyed have experienced payments-related cyber incidents, exposing an urgent need for change.
